name: Trade My Money Bot
description: Can Discord beat the stock market?  Trade stocks and make me money.  Or lose it.  Please don't lose it all.

scripts.dev: cross-env ALPACA_KEY_ID=123 ALPACA_SECRET_KEY=123 ALPACA_PAPER=true DISCORD_TOKEN=123 MONGO_URL=mongo://localhost MONGO_DB=tradebot nodemon --exec ./node_modules/.bin/babel-node index.js

author: Dan
